description:
Works to trees in front garden subject to Barnsbury No.4 TPO 1976. 

 Works:  3 Limes (T20, T22, T23):-   Crown Thin 20%, Crown                                     Lift 2.5m., Cut Back to                                     Clear Building and Phone                                     Wires by 1.5m.         Walnut (T21):-              Crown Lift 2.5m., Crown                                     Thin 25%, Cut Back to                                     Clear Building and Phone                                     Wires by 1.5m.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The tree shall be felled to ground level and the stump shall be reduced to 300mm diameter below ground level 

 REASON: To protect the health and stablity of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
